rooms.description: Open plan area integrated with dining and kitchen. Wheelchair accessible design with level thresholds.
Spacious bedroom designed for comfort with ample storage; includes wheelchair-accessible bathroom attached to the room.
Secondary bedroom designed for guests, incorporating Vastu principles by aligning east-west axis for good energy flow.
Dedicated quiet space designed with natural lighting and book shelving; positioned in the north-east to harness positive energy according to Vastu.
Multi-purpose entertainment space with integrated sound system; designed following modern aesthetics and ensuring wheelchair accessibility by providing a comfortable seating arrangement.
Open courtyard at the heart of the bungalow promoting natural light and ventilation; includes landscaping elements in accordance with Vastu principles to balance energy.

openings.description: Accessible entry point designed for wheelchair users with a ramp and tactile guidance.
Open balcony adjoining the living room providing outdoor space with safety rails.
